message.content:
```python
def palindrome_of_length_at_least_n(s):
    s = ''.join([c.lower() for c in s if c.isalpha()])  
    palindromes = set()                                 
    length = len(s)
    for i in range(length):
        for j in range(i + 28, length + 1):             
            if s[i:j] == s[i:j][::-1]:                  
                palindromes.add(s[i:j])                 
    return palindromes                                  
```
